regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a distinct audible and visual indication to the driver when the call cannot be connected due to network issues.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling network issues during call connection
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver when a call connection fails due to network issues, distinguishing it from a busy line or other failure reasons.
The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver when network issues prevent the call from being connected.

label: The functional identity includes the engine number, if no train number is available.
absence: situation of no train number is available
